programme.title: A sceptic's guide to wellness: A sceptic's guide to wellness
programme.desc: Guardian journalist Richard Sprenger journeys into the wellness industry to see what it can offer people with autoimmune conditions.

programme.title: Fish story
programme.desc: Sometime in the 1980s, Caspar Salmon's grandmother was invited to a gathering on the Welsh island of Anglesey, attended exclusively by people with fish surnames. Or so he says. Thirty years later, film-maker Charlie Lyne attempts to sort myth from reality.

programme.title: Dear Bradford: a love letter to a misunderstood city
programme.desc: From Muslim ‘no-go areas' to Brexit-voting white nationalists, stereotypes continue to be perpetuated about Bradford 21 years after the 'race riots'. Farhaan was born in the city in the 1980s to a family of south Asian Muslim heritage. From a young age he feared being ‘found out' and lived a dual existence, moving away from Bradford as soon as he could. He spent years travelling the world and teaching English. But, when the coronavirus pandemic hit, Farhaan was reluctantly forced to return to his hometown. Through his beloved grandma, or 'Amma', and the poetry of his late grandfather, Farhaan learned how to love Bradford – and himself.

programme.title: Erica: man made
programme.desc: Erica is 23. She has a beautiful, neutral face and speaks with a synthesised voice. She has a degree of autonomy – but can't move her hands yet. Hiroshi Ishiguro is her ‘father' and the bad boy of Japanese robotics. Together they will redefine what it means to be human and reveal that the future is closer than we might think.

programme.title: The only way out is through Jesus: The El Salvador pastors saving MS-13 gang members
programme.desc: In El Salvador, where brutal gangs like MS-13 and 18th Street have given the country the world's highest murder rate, the only way out for members is to become born-again Christians. In this intimate look at the lives of former gang members, we follow two pastors from the rival gangs as they convert gang members to stop them falling back into violent ways

programme.title: Chalk Girl
programme.desc: Chalk Girl: a protester at the heart of Hong Kong's democracy movement. Two years since her arrest made her an accidental infamous hero of the pro-democracy umbrella movement, the 16-year-old must decide whether to rejoin the battle alongside the 'localist' youth. As elections loom, Chalk Girl is torn between wanting to respect her family, who are concerned about the risks of her activism, and standing up to Chinese interference.

programme.title: My life in a hotel room: Ireland's hidden homeless crisis
programme.desc: Nuala and her teenage daughter, Laura, were suddenly evicted from their Dublin home when their landlord of 10 years was forced to sell by his creditors. They haven't been able to find a new place to rent. Despite having been on the council house waiting list for more than six years they are still only around 600th in line. Now, like almost 10,000 other people and 1,700 families across Ireland, Nuala and Laura are homeless..

programme.title: Lady of the Gobi
programme.desc: On Mongolia's coal highway to the Chinese border, truck driver Maikhuu dreams of a better life and financial security for her three children. However, the road from the mines to China is riddled with accidents, toxic pollution, poor hygiene and now, amid the Covid crisis, drivers face days of quarantine on the border. Trapped in a hazardous industry, Maikhuu's journey reflects the human and environmental costs of Mongolia's mining boom.

programme.title: The UK's first professional trans choir: 'It's a joyful act of resistance'
programme.desc: Anil Sebastian and Coda Galabov are the creators of a new choir called Trans Voices, which offers a space for trans and non-binary people who have felt unable to sing with their true voices in traditional choirs. We follow the group as they improvise their first performance at London's Union Chapel, composing what they see as a joyful act of resistance.

programme.title: Somali Night Fever
programme.desc: In the 1970s and 80s Mogadishu's airwaves were filled with Somali funk, disco, soul and reggae. Musicians rocking afros and bell-bottom trousers would perform at the city's trendiest nightclubs during the height of the country's golden era of music. But it was short-lived: a brutal civil war began, musicians fled to all corners of the world and the vibrant music scene came to an end.

programme.desc: If you like cars…and you don\'t like going slow…then it\'s time to go fast and get furious. Undercover cop Lucas White joins Vin Serento\'s LA gang of illegal street racers as they plan to double cross LA\'s crime kingpin. The gang\'s outrageous wheel-spinning plan is as daring as it is ridiculous and will see them towing the whole damn restaurant, at crazy speeds, half-way across the city. But as Vin Serento says, \"It\'s not the car you drive... it\'s the driver who drives the car…who\'s doing the driving\”

programme.title: A Simple Wedding
programme.desc: From the producers of My Big Fat Greek Wedding, this is the hilarious and heart-warming story of Nousha ayoung Iranian-American attorney who despite having a great job, supportive friends, and a comfortable life is unable to please her conservative Persian parents. So when she falls for the charming but unorthodox Alex, it brings instant chaos into her traditional family life — leading to a wedding that will be anything but simple.

programme.title: Swiped
programme.desc: A womanising college student (Noah Centineo) enlists his nerdy roommate (Kendall Sanders) to code the ultimate hook up app by offering to pay his tuition for MIT but unexpected consequences ensue.

programme.title: Sea Level
programme.desc: Pup, a bamboo shark, discovers egg sacs while playing around the ocean with his friends. When he sees human poachers stealing the eggs from his reef, Pup makes it his mission to save his family. As he leaves the sea and enters the beautiful, yet dangerous, world of humans he'll prove he isn't too small to save his family.

programme.title: Ice Part II
programme.desc: The destructive effects of global warming cause unimaginable devastation and panic worldwide in this post-apocalyptic disaster film starring A-list cast- Richard Roxburgh (Hacksaw Ridge) and Sam Neil (Jurassic Park).

programme.title: Drone DR1 (AKA Rotor DR1)
programme.desc: In a post-apocalyptic world where half the population is dead or missing and the sky is full of autonomous drones, a 16-year-old boy named Kitch sets out to find his father, joined by DR1, his drone companion.

programme.title: The Cannonball Run
programme.desc: The classic comedy with cool stars and even cooler cars! Based on a true race event, Burt Reynolds leads an all-star cast in the ultimate quest to win The Cannonball Run.

programme.title: Double Dragon
programme.desc: Evil meets its match in this daring martial arts adventure about two teen brothers out to stop an obsessed tycoon from finding both halves of a mystical talisman.

programme.title: The Robot Giant
programme.desc: A great war has just finished when a giant robot, finds himself wandering, lost and alone. Luckily, he stumbles into a tiny, hapless robot who has lost his memory and is now stuck with his new companion. Together, the pair decide to journey across the desert in search of Ram, the creator of all robots, to learn more about themselves. A fun and heart-warming adventure, perfect for all family!

programme.title: Jock of the Bushveld
programme.desc: Short legs, big heart that's Jock who grows up in South Africa with his loyal friend Percy

programme.title: White Vengeance
programme.desc: Two inexplicably coherent zombies awake amidst a zombie attack, and decide to take a road trip

programme.title: God Bless The Broken Road
programme.desc: God Bless the Broken Road tells the story of a young mother who loses her husband in Afghanistan and struggles to raise their young daughter in his absence. The film combines elements of faith, country music, and stock car racing while paying tribute to those who serve in the United States Military.

programme.title: Love In Aruba
programme.desc: A lonely teacher (Amber) is hired by Connor, the single father of a struggling student. She is to tutor his daughter Macey (age 10) over a summer while they travel for his work. As Amber helps Macey, she sees glimpses of what's missing in the family's life. Their grand destinations are filled with rich items and potential rewarding business deals, but it's missing heart. Amber's influence fills the void and brings Macey and Connor together. With it, Amber starts to fall in love with Connor, but can he see her as anything beyond the hired help?

programme.title: Ultimate Legacy
programme.desc: Having dealt with the tragedies and perils of his own family, Jason must try to help a friend along a similar journey. This touching movie shows that if we learn something, we change our own life. And when we teach something, we change another's life. But when we teach people to teach, we change the world.

programme.title: Timeless Love
programme.desc: Megan seems to have the perfect life with a wonderful husband named Thomas and 2 adorable children. Then she finds herself awakening from a coma – and discovers she is not and has never been married. But when she meets Thomas for real, she seizes the chance to help him fall in love with her, again—for the first time.

programme.title: All For Love
programme.desc: Jaded romance novelist Jo Payden has a tight deadline for her latest novel. Her last novel wasn't a big success so when her editor Diana recommends teaming up Colin, a Navy SEAL who also happens to be her brother, she jumps at the opportunity. Jo's enthusiasm quickly turns to dread as she realizes that Colin has signed her up for his Navy SEAL training Boot Camp.

programme.desc: A group of Mexican revolutionaries murders a town priest and a number of his christian followers. Ten years later, a widow arrives in town intent to take revenge from her husband's killers.

programme.title: Boot Hill
programme.desc: Victims of oppressive town boss Honey are offered help by an unusual alliance of gunmen and circus performers.

programme.desc: Ted Hayden impersonates a wanted man and joins Gentry's gang only to learn later that Gentry was the one who killed his father. He saves Virginia Winters' dad's ranch from Gentry and also rescues his long-lost brother Spud.

programme.desc: During the Civil War, a group of confederate soldiers with the help of Apache Indians, try to defeat a Union fort, while trying to gain support from Emperor Maximillian of Mexico.

programme.title: Goddess
programme.desc: Elspeth Dickens dreams of finding her voice despite being stuck in an isolated farmhouse with her twin toddlers. A web-cam becomes her pathway to fame and fortune, but at a price.

programme.title: A Random Encounter
programme.desc: This whirlwind rom-com proves that finding Prince Charming can be a right royal pain. Sassy Mindy is well and truly immersed in the superficial dating scene, while her best friend Laura is a hopeless romantic. So when she has a chance moment with a stranger in a coffee shop, she is left wondering whether this could blossom into a lifelong romance?

programme.title: We Too Together
programme.desc: An autistic boy and his Father who returns from war with PTSD help each other find peace with the help of martial arts and music. As a man Rob also learns to follow his heart when he finds a woman who loves him just as he is.

programme.title: Santa Fe Marshal
programme.desc: U.S. Marshal Hopalong Cassidy is called when a town becomes overrun with bad guys. Disguised as a member of a medicine show, Hoppy discovers that the ringleader is none other than sweet li'l ol' Ma Burton.

programme.title: Shoot TO Kill
programme.desc: A woman apparently marries a corrupt deputy D.A. to get evidence that a certain criminal was framed for murder.

programme.title: Silver On The Sage
programme.desc: Hoppy goes undercover as an Eastern gambler to rein in the fraternal perpetrators of a cattle-rustling scheme.

programme.title: Sleepless
programme.desc: Count Karl Ulysses von Salis-Marschlins was a Swiss botanist and naturalist. He travelled widely observing and studying the lands he visited. In 1789 he travelled in the Kingdom of Naples. On returning home, he wrote a book about it. Here is how he described his visit to the "Casino del Duca" at San Basilio, the largest estate of Apulia, South Italy. "Anapeson" are these places, now, sleepless and abandoned within the distracted modernity. The History as ruins.

programme.title: Somebody Up There Likes Me
programme.desc: Byington creates an offbeat energy by brilliantly pairing established actors and non-actors in this comedic fable about a man watching his life fly by. Max (Keith Poulson), along with his best friend Sal (Nick Offerman, "Parks & Recreation") and the woman they both adore, Lyla (Jess Weixler, TEETH), stumble through thirty-five years of seemingly mandatory but unfulfilling entanglements.

programme.title: Stray Dog
programme.desc: During a sweltering summer, a rookie homicide detective tries to track down his stolen Colt pistol.

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Too Little
programme.desc: While thinking he's participating in a street theater performance, an American video store clerk is mistaken for an international spy and bumbles his way through a web of espionage, inadvertently besting Europe's top assassins.

programme.title: Elektra
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Elektra unwittingly takes part in her former teacher's test when she protects a former target and his daughter from "The Hand," a sinister crime syndicate of martial arts fighters.

programme.title: Paranoia
programme.desc: An entry-level employee at a powerful corporation finds himself occupying a corner office, but at a dangerous price: he must spy on his boss's old mentor to secure for him a multi-billion dollar advantage.

programme.title: The Cobbler
programme.desc: A cobbler, bored of his everyday life, stumbles upon a magical heirloom that allows him to become other people and see the world in a different way.

programme.title: The lost medallion
programme.desc: A man who stops into a foster home to drop off some donations soon tells the kids a story about two teenage friends who uncover a long-lost medallion that transports them back in time.

programme.title: Chloe & Theo
programme.desc: From the northern ice comes a gentler kind of hero.

programme.title: Night of the living dead
programme.desc: A disparate group of individuals takes refuge in an abandoned house when corpses begin to leave the graveyard in search of fresh human bodies to devour. The pragmatic Ben does his best to control the situation, but when the reanimated bodies surround the house, the other survivors begin to panic. As any semblance of order within the group begins to dissipate, the zombies start to find ways inside and one by one, the living humans become the prey of the deceased ones.

programme.title: Mission 88
programme.desc: A scientist and a pilot volunteer for a high profile mission to reach the end of the universe. After 13 years, the ship crashes through the end of the universe and into the unknown.

programme.title: One Last Dance
programme.desc: In the wake of tragedy, a renowned NY dance company is on the brink of collapse. After leaving the dance world for good, Travis, Chrissa and Max have one last chance to re-connect with the passion and prove that miracles really can happen.

programme.title: Love You to Death
programme.desc: A prosecutor must work on a case which reminds her of her childhood, when her mother was killed by her alcoholic father.

programme.title: Time Capsule
programme.desc: After many years, a group of friends reunite at the summer camp of their youth, which is on the verge of being sold off. When reliving their past joys, loves and sorrows, they open a time capsule that brings old tensions to the surface and inspires some newfound relationships.

programme.title: I Think I Do
programme.desc: The relationship between three sisters, as one is left at the altar on her wedding day.

programme.title: The Past Never Dies
programme.desc: CASEY MARSH was born in captivity. Her mother, JANE, was abducted as a teenager and gave birth to Casey while she was being held by the kidnapper, TIMOTHY FAST. Jane eventually escaped when Casey was 6 years old. Timothy Fast was arrested and incarcerated. Ever since, Jane has struggled to regain a normal life for her and her daughter. For Casey, the memories of a childhood in captivity still haunt her. Jane, on the other hand, has seemingly moved on. She has re-married and is happy. When a number of local women start to go missing, Jane reveals to Casey that Timothy might have had an accomplice and wonders if he is involved. The kidnapping M.O. is eerily similar. Casey is furious that her mother has hidden this knowledge from her all this time. Then, Jane suddenly disappears. Has she been kidnapped again? Casey must face the demons of her past in order to find her mother before it's too late.

programme.title: Looking for Grace
programme.desc: After a teenage girl named Grace goes missing, her parents along with the help of an investigator seek to find her, while also juggling their own secrets and stories between them.

programme.title: Ava's Magical Adventure
programme.desc: Ava is a 10-year-old girl who runs away from home with her best friend, Nellie, a 2-ton circus elephant. They are pursued by everyone from the police to the circus' owner.

programme.title: The Foodie
programme.desc: Chef Liz heads north to Maine to go lobster fishing out of historic Perkins Cove. After bringing in the day's catch, she visits the famous Lobster Pound learning all about cooking the perfect lobster dish.

programme.title: Sensitive and in Love
programme.desc: A millennial writer from San Francisco travels to the Philippines where she and her brother, a music producer, must come face to face with their traumatic childhood and embrace their seemingly unbearable trait.

programme.title: Starting Up Love
programme.desc: Workaholic Jillian inherits a beautiful mountainside cabin after her long-lost, wealthy uncle dies. She plans to sell it, but handsome caretaker Liam makes her an offer she can't refuse, and sparks fly as they work to transform the cabin into a holiday resort. But when business doesn't go to plan, will Jillian give up everything for the love she never saw coming?

programme.title: Our Dream Wedding
programme.desc: Commitment-shy Haley is as anti-marriage as it gets, but when she tries on her grandma's ‘magical' wedding veil, she's transported to her future, where she and long-term boyfriend Scott are happily married with two beautiful children. Shocked, Haley tracks down her family to make sense of her vision and her view on love is changed for good. Is Haley ready to take the veil off – and is she finally ready for what will come after?

programme.title: Future My Love
programme.desc: A unique love story challenging our collective and personal utopias in search of freedom. At the brink of losing the idealistic love of her life, filmmaker Maja Borg takes us on a poetic road trip through the financial collapse, exploring a radically different economic and social model proposed by 95-year-old futurist Jacque Fresco. How much freedom are we prepared to give to the ones we love? And how much responsibility are we ready to take for our society? Carefully weaving a texture of archive footage, black and white Super 8 film, and colour HD, Borg poignantly depicts the universal struggle between our heads and hearts in times of big change.

programme.title: Romance Retreat
programme.desc: After a break-up, journalist Dana Willingham finds herself alone and stuck at a couple's yoga retreat while the biggest story of her career breaks far away. But when she meets handsome fellow retreater Stefan Gonzales who's lying low after being the center of a scandal, she smells a good story. As she gains his trust and the pair get closer, will she choose the perfect story or the perfect man?

programme.title: Lonesome Jim
programme.desc: Failing to make it on his own, Jim moves back in with his parents and deals with crippling family obligations.

programme.title: Destruction: Las Vegas
programme.desc: As a group of college kids party in Las Vegas, a furious windstorm unlike any other descends upon the city.

programme.title: Body of Deceit
programme.desc: Thriller with a love triangle set in beautiful Mediterranean locations.

programme.title: Double Identity
programme.desc: Trapped Behind Borders, Caught Between Lies

programme.title: The Son of No One
programme.desc: A cop is assigned to the neighborhood where he grew up, where an old secret threatens to destroy his family.

programme.title: The Spy Gone North
programme.desc: A critically-acclaimed, edge of your seat spy thriller from director Jong-bin Yoon. 1993 Korea, the Cold War continues and tensions surrounding the development of nuclear weapons escalate. Seok-young Park, an army major in the South Korea military intelligence is assigned to infiltrate the North Korean nuclear facility. However, he soon learns a secret that is shared by both nations.

programme.title: A Kid Like Jake
programme.desc: A heart-breaking family drama starring Claire Danes, Jim Parsons and Octavia Spencer. Parents, Alex and Greg are approaching an important crossroads - finding the "right" primary school for their son, Jake, a precocious four-year-old who happens to prefer Disney princesses to G.I. Joe. However, as Jake's behaviour becomes increasingly erratic and perplexing, a rift begins to emerge between them.

programme.title: Repression
programme.desc: A gripping and twisty Hitchcock-esque thriller set in Scotland with a stellar British cast, including Peter Mullan and Rebecca Front. When therapist Marianne attempts a new life, she is thrown off course by her young patient Manny who claims he can control her future. Marianne struggles with silence from her colleagues and her own mind as she tries to uncover the truth behind Mannys drawings.

programme.title: Jiu Jitsu

Humanity is on the brink of extinction as a being from another world returns to Earth to face off against the best warriors the human race has to offer. Frank Grillo (Captain America: Winter Soldier), Alain Moussi (Kickboxer: Retaliation) and Tony Jaa (Ong-Bak) make up the action-packed ensemble.

programme.title: Black Widow
programme.desc: A journalist begins to suspect that someone she knows could be linked to several murders.

programme.title: Push
programme.desc: Riveting Sci-Fi action-thriller Push is set in a deadly world of psychic espionage where the ability to move objects using only the mind, see the future, create new realities and kill without ever touching the victim can turn a person into a lethal weapon - or a target. A young man (Chris Evans - Sunshine, Fantastic Four ) and a teenage girl with extraordinary gifts (Dakota Fanning - War of the Worlds) take on a clandestine agency in a battle they can win only if they change the future.

programme.title: Hours
programme.desc: Paul Walker plays Nolan Hayes, the father of a child born prematurely in New Orleans just before the onset of Hurricane Katrina. With his wife having died in childbirth, Nolan is plunged, alone, into a desperate fight to save his newborn baby's life as the city crumbles around him...

programme.title: Freeheld
programme.desc: Diagnosed with terminal cancer, decorated New Jersey detective Laurel Hester (Julianne Moore) wishes to leave her pension benefits to domestic partner Stacie Andree (Elliot Page). Denied by local county officials, Laurel receives help from hard-nosed colleague Dane Wells (Michael Shannon) and activist Steven Goldstein (Steve Carell), who unite to rally fellow police officers and ordinary citizens to support the couple's fight for equality.

programme.title: From Time to Time
programme.desc: In 1940s England, thirteen year old Tolly is sent to Green Knowe, the country estate of his grandmother, while his mother searches for any information concerning his missing in action father. Tolly soon finds that he can pass through time to witness the family stories Grandmother Oldknow tells him. Traveling back to 1805, Tolly becomes caught up in the family scandals, secrets, and mysteries that still echo in his own time...

programme.title: Walt Before Mickey
programme.desc: The legendary Walt Disney had a tumultuous childhood, yet he was determined to overcome obstacles in his path, before the creation of his first iconic character: Mickey Mouse.

programme.title: Storm Boy
programme.desc: When Michael Kingley (Geoffrey Rush), a retired businessman, sees images from his past that he can't explain, he is forced to recall his childhood memories and how, as a boy, he rescued and raised an orphaned pelican, Mr Percival. Based on the International best-selling book, Storm Boy is a timeless story of unconditional friendship.

programme.title: Death Of A Salesman
programme.desc: Willy Loman is an aging, traveling salesman, who despairs that his life his been lived in vain. Facing dispensability and insignificance in a heated, youthful economy, Willy is not ready to part with his cherished fantasies of an America that admires him for personable triumphs in the marketplace.

programme.title: Chloe & Theo
programme.desc: Chloe, a young woman who has been searching for something to believe in, is living on the streets of New York City. She comes face to face with an Inuit Eskimo named Theo, who was sent By his elders to send a message to humankind.

programme.title: Mythica: A Quest for Heroes
programme.desc: Mythica follows the enchanting adventures of Marek, a wizard born with the dark powers of necromancy, trapped in a life of eternal servitude. With the help of beautiful a priestess, Teela, Marek escapes her master and assembles a team of adventurers to embark on an epic quest to rescue Teela's sister from a vicious Ogre. Marek's powers are put to the test as she learns to harness the magic that threatens to corrupt her. Featuring a formidable heroine, a band of brutish brothers, and a startling fantasy world, Mythica depicts the spellbinding tale of Marek's fight for freedom.

programme.title: Shepherd: The Hero Dog
programme.desc: Based on true events. Shepherd: The Hero Dog' follows the perilous journey to freedom when a young boy and his dog attempt to escape a concentration camp during World War II. When Kaleb, a beautiful German Shepherd, is taken away from his Jewish family he is captured by an SS Officer, and trained to help round up and terrorize Jewish prisoners. But when Kaleb's former master, young Joshua, arrives at the camp, the dog rediscovers his unwavering loyalty. Together the pair attempt to escape the camp and begin their journey to freedom.

programme.title: Encounter
programme.desc: A group of friends make a remarkable discovery in a rural field - a crashed spacecraft - And there's a survivor. But when they bring the otherworldly being home, they soon discover that it holds even greater secrets than they could imagine. But with the government on their tail, time is running out to ascertain the alien's true intentions.

programme.title: Battle for Skyark
programme.desc: In the near future the earth has become desolate and dangerous. Now inhabited by by a mysterious race of creatures, humanity has been forced to find refuge in the Skyark, a man-made city in the sky. As the population grows, space becomes scarce and only the rich and powerful can stay, dumping the poor and orphaned of Skyark to the abandoned earth. Among them is one boy, Rags, the son of a fallen commander who is determined to save his fellow orphans and exiles. Together with his friends, he must battle through the ruins of old earth, fighting off the horde of alien monsters to return to Skyark and bring peace back to the people.

programme.title: Britain's Horror Homes
programme.desc: A man and his wife, who moved into their dream home 18 years ago, describe the nightmare they faced at the hands of Japanese knotweed. The invasive plant found its way into their garden from a nearby wasteland, and has been known to rip apart drains, roads and even the concrete foundations of buildings. A couple living in Birmingham's trendy Drury Quarter explain why have considered finding a new home after a flock of noisy seagulls took up residence in the vicinity, and a mother-of-two reveals how her joy at moving into a South London flat turned to concern when her children began to develop worrying red rashes.

programme.title: World's Weirdest Restaurants
programme.desc: World's Weirdest Restaurants takes you to ‘Breakfast in the Sky', a giant Ferris wheel on the Jersey shore where they serve up ultra-gourmet breakfasts and spectacular views. Then we're off to ‘Tiroler Hut', an Austrian haven in the heart of London where the authentic cuisine and lederhosen will make you yodel for “more cowbell!” Later we'll visit ‘Le Cabaret du Roy' in Montreal, where pirates will have you walking the plank for their French-Caribbean fusion. Next we journey to ‘Japan's Subtropical Teahouse' to sip tea amongst tortoises and other reptiles, and ‘Usagi To Café' where the bunny-shaped food is almost as cute as the real-life rabbits.

programme.title: World's Weirdest Restaurants
programme.desc: World's Weirdest Restaurants takes you aboard the ‘Charlie Russell Chew Choo', a two-hour Montana train excursion that's interrupted by a band of horse-riding, gun-slinging outlaws who crash your prime rib dinner. Then at ‘Shinyokohama Raumen Museum' we'll take a whirlwind noodle-slurping tour of four of Japan's unique raumen regions, all under one roof. Next, we'll kick back with some beach side BBQ at ‘Tropical Islands', a year-round oasis in the middle of Germany, complete with a rainforest and tropical beach. And at Bangkok's ‘Hajime Robot', high tech robots will serve you Japanese cuisine – and teach you some dance moves to boot!

programme.title: World's Weirdest Restaurants
programme.desc: World's Weirdest Restaurants takes you to ‘Sammy's Roumanian Steak House', an authentic Jewish restaurant in New York where their every-day-is-a-bar-mitzvah attitude will make you say “mazel tov!” Next, at Tokyo's ‘Namahage' a visit from the Japanese boogeymen will have you on your best behaviour. We visit Ferrara, Italy where diners dressed in white take to the streets like a flash mob for ‘Street Dinner', carrying tables and chairs to a secret rendezvous point where you'll dine al fresco on a surprise gourmet meal. And later, at the 5,000 seat ‘Royal Dragon' in Thailand, the flying servers will rush your hot pot to your table—on a zip line!

programme.desc: When Jestro uses the Book of Greed to rob Auremville of its riches, he also gets Lance's parents as prisoners and these demanding rich folks are too much for even monsters to handle. The BOM convinces Jestro to call forth GENERAL MAGMAR, and Jestro appoints him as “general manager” of “castle operations,” much to Magmar's dismay. Meanwhile, Jestro and the BOM find the BOOK OF GREED. This will allow them to make greedy, rapacious monsters that will bring them all the treasure they want to fill their castle! They'll head to the richest town in the realm – AUREMVILLE! Meanwhile, in Auremville, the NEXO-Knights arrive for a huge “Gold is Good” ball at Lance's house. When the Monsters finally arrive in Auremville, a battle breaks out and the greedy monsters make off with everything…including Lance's parents, Goldie and Cuthbert Richmond who are clad in the finest golden garments and so look valuable! Lance will now be forced to live…poor. The Knights have to get his parents back. Meanwhile, his parents – Cuthbert and Goldie Richmond –think their imprisonment in Jestro's gold-filled castle is a “spa holiday” with the worst service. They order Magmar and the monsters around like servants and drive them all crazy. The Knights pile into the Fortrex and head for the Lava Lands, formulating a plan along the way to free Lance's parents. In a village half-way to Jestro's Castle, the Knights run into…Jestro and his monsters headed the other way with Lance's parents and all the gold they've stolen. There's a big fight, until they realize they might have the same goal and decide to deal. The BOM wants to give them back all the gold and Lance's parents. Lance says “No deal.” “We'll take the gold, you can keep my parents.” It's a weird and comical stand-off. Finally, Clay convinces Lance he has to take his parents back even if they don't always get along (and, it's the only way to get the gold back.)

programme.title: Developers Play LEGO The Incredibles: Open World Hub & Crime Waves
programme.desc: Bear and Sam from TT Games continue to play through LEGO The Incredibles by visiting the Open World Hub and showing us Crime Waves. Comment below with your thoughts on the game and subscribe to LEGO Gaming to be notified of new videos each week!

programme.title: Creating LEGO DC Super Villains: Open World Gameplay
programme.desc: Check out this exclusive LEGO DC Super Villains Developer Commentary just in time for the launch of the game. Explore the character creation process and open world with TT Games Community Manager Bear Parker and Executive Producer Phillip Ring.

programme.title: The Book Of Obsession
programme.desc: The Knights are tasked with protecting the King's valuable Ned Knights comic book during the Bookingheim Knight-a-Con. But with all the costumed kids there, will they recognize the real Jestro and Book of Monsters coming to get them? King Halbert instructs the Knights that they must take his valuable Ned Knights comic book to the “Knight-a-Kon” in Bookingham. It will be the first be first prize at the Knight-a-Kon. But the Book of Monsters wants the book, too. Having devoured Ned Knightly comic books in it's down time it has become fanatically obsessed with the storyline. General Magmar suggests they simply attack the place and take what they want, but Jestro tells them they can't: everyone will be in costume and they'll be thousands of comics there. This calls for a clever “infiltration” mission (which will also allow Jestro to see the Kon, which he's always wanted to do.) So Jestro goes into the Kon with the BOM and some monsters. And it's easy because everyone is in costume Jestro, the BOM and their monsters fit right in at the convention and Clay and crew have their work cut out for them trying to separate fiend from fan. Macy keeps going on-and-on about the story in the King's comic book as the Knights keep a watchful eye on it. Robin even shows up in the “Minitrex” – a small version of the Fortrex he built just for the Knight-a-Kon. He's convinced he can win the costume competition that is the big closing event for the Kon. At the end of the Kon there's a big awards ceremony for “Best Costume.” The prize: “Ned Knightly, Knight of Knighton, Issue #1.” The BOM must get it and scheme to get closer to it during the costume contest. He's just…about…to get the book when…the impatient Magmar attacks! Everyone thinks it's part of the big show! “Ned Knightly, Knight of Knighton, Issue #1” is tossed from person-to-person-to-person in the melee. The Knights must do something, but they're too far away from the Fortrex to download any NEXO-Power. Robin pulls up in his Minitrex they can use it to get NEXO-Power! Robin wins the best costume for his Minitrex and wins the Ned Knightly Comic which he then gives to Macy…she deserves to read it.

programme.title: LEGO DC Super Villains: Gorilla City Exclusive Developer Walkthrough
programme.desc: Watch as Phil and Matt from TT Games share a LEGO DC Super Villains walkthrough of Gorilla City a new level in game. This level features a boss battle between Gorilla Grodd and Solovar.

programme.title: The King's Tournament
programme.desc: Rival to the King, Jorah Tightwad thinks his knights – the Tighty Knighties – are easily better than the NEXO-Knights, so he challenges King Halbert to prove who's better during the King's Birthday Tournament. It's the King's birthday! To celebrate, the Queen and Macy always throw him a great, big birthday party consisting of a feast on birthday eve and a tournament the next day. At the birthday banquet is JORAH TIGHTWAD (last seen in episode 104.) He's goading the King (and on his birthday, even) and going on and on about how his knights are better than the NEXO-Knights. The King protests, but Jorah asks “How many magical books have your knights recovered? None, zilch, zero.” But he produces the BOOK OF ENVY, which his superior knights captured from Jestro. The next day, the NEXO-Knights square off against Tightwad's four knights: JOUSTING BEEBER, BRICKNEY SPEARS, SHIA LABLADE and THE BLOK. We see that all these knights are envious of the NEXO-Knights: their weapons, their fame, their hair, etc. Macy is also disappointed to find out she CAN'T fight in the tournament – she's agreed to be in “princess mode” for her father's birthday. During the tournament, we see that Tightwad's knights are amazing in fighting contests. They all pair-off with knights who have their same weapons skills. Tightwad makes fun of the NEXO-Knights as his knights do well. Jestro and the Book of Monsters discover that Tightwad has the Book of Envy and he and his monsters attack the tournament. Then we learn that Tightwad's knights might be good tournament fighters, but they can't handle real fights and the NEXO-Knights must save them! Macy is finally able to join in the fight when she sees Magmar show up on the flank. The NEXO-Knights successfully defend the king, but Jestro gets away with the Book of Envy. Tightwad must admit his knights never won the book from Jestro he got the book when Merlok blasted books of magic across the realm. Tightwad's knights all admit that they really admire the NEXO-Knights.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Dojo Challenges With N60 Sean
programme.sub-title: The LEGO Ninjago Movie Video Game
programme.desc: N60Sean joins us back in the LEGO Gaming den playing through Dojo Challenges in The LEGO Ninjago Movie Video Game. Watch as he battles The Master Chicken and completes a challenge on The Stormy Docks. Dojos are areas where you will fight multiple waves of enemies and one boss.

programme.title: Monster Chef
programme.desc: Axl and Chef Éclair must enter a cooking contest to try to keep Jestro from getting the hottest chili recipe in the realm. Knighton celebrity chef GOBBLETON RAMBLEY announces that he's developed the hottest chili recipe ever created. Now, he intends to give the recipe to the winner of his “Hottest Chili Cook-Off Competition” cooking show on Knighton TV. He'll turn over his famous Chili Cookbook with the hottest chili recipe on the last page. It's so unique it can't be recreated without it. Jestro and the Book of Monsters think they MUST have that recipe. “Hot chili makes hot monsters!” Merlok knows that this recipe, in the wrong hands – meaning Jestro's – could be dangerous. But when the Knights appeal to the egomaniacal chef, he says the only way to get the recipe is to win it from him. So Axl and Chef Éclair decide to enter. The team that creates the hottest chili will win Rambley's cookbook. Chef Éclair is unsure that Axl has the skills to help them win the competition, but, as we see through funny cooking show bits, Axl is quite good and they become a pretty good team. (We will also learn that years ago, Rambley stole one of Éclair's best recipes and they don't like each other.) While watching the multi-part competition, Aaron and Lance have a contest of their own: who can eat the hottest chili. Axl and Éclair actually win the competition, coming up with a raging hot chili recipe. Before they can claim their prize, Jestro and his monsters attack with Magmar leading the way on his siege tower. They must get that cookbook! During the battle, Rambley's cookbook is accidentally melted. After the battle, Rambley announces his new quest: to make the sweetest ice cream ever! While Axl and Éclair cook happily in the kitchen of the Fortrex, back in the Redoubt of Ruination, Jestro and Lavaria are attempting to recreate Rambley's chili recipe. They keep spooning various recipes of chili into the Book of Monsters. “Nope, not hot enough…waaaay too much garlic….you call that hot?!” (BELCH!)

programme.title: N60Sean Plays: Chapter 6 'The Ninjas Defeated'
programme.sub-title: The LEGO Ninjago Movie Video Game
programme.desc: YouTuber N60Sean takes over for SeaPeeKay in the LEGO Gaming den as he plays through Chapter 6 "The Ninjas Defeated" in our Let's Play of The LEGO Ninjago Movie Video Game.

programme.title: LEGO Stop Motion Animation Compilation
programme.desc: Special LEGO stop motion animation compilation of LEGO Minecraft funny videos for parents and kids! From various brick films from 2017, 2018 and 2019 with all your favourite Minecraft characters and sets such as the Skeleton Gang, Bedrock Escape, Killer Bunny, the Sheep, Piggies, Mobs, Creepers and of course Steve!

programme.title: The Surge
programme.desc: After a time of peace, the Ninja are called back into action. The spirit of the defeated Overlord has infected the electric grid of Ninjago and is using all available technology to exact his revenge on Lloyd. Nowhere is safe but fortunately, the Ninja have been given the powerful Techno Blades. But the only problem is that they have no idea how to use them. Time has passed since the Ultimate Battle, and while the Golden Ninja continues to watch over Ninjago, the other Ninja have become complacent as schoolteachers. When a mysterious invitation from genius Cyrus Borg brings them to the futuristic New Ninjago City, trouble surges when a digital virus of the Overlord takes over technology. The Golden Ninja makes a heroic entrance, only to find out his Golden Power supercharges the enemy. Sensei Wu stays behind so that the Ninja can escape with the only thing that can save Ninjago's future – Borg's Techno Weapons.

programme.title: Fire, Lava, Volcano And Helicopter Rescue LEGO Cartoons
programme.sub-title: LEGO City Movies For Kids In English
programme.desc: Watch this LEGO City 2018 cartoon movies compilation full episodes videos with fire, lava, volcano, and helicopter rescue! Those funny cartoons for kids boys and girls contain: Explore the secret of lava, Flying Contract, Wacky Vacation, The Escape from Prison Island, All hands to the rescue.

programme.title: The Art Of The Silent Fist
programme.desc: The Ninja go into hiding but an army of the Digtial Overlord's evil robotic Nindroids are hunting them wherever they go. Their only chance is to learn the secrets of the Techno blades and use them to cut all power to save Ninjao from this technological menace. The Ninja hide out at a safe place void of technology – Sensei Garmadon's Sanctuary. That night, Zane is visited by Borg's female robo-assistant, Pixal. She warns them that the Digital Overlord is after Lloyd's Golden Power in order to become flesh, but the Techno Blades can reboot the system and erase him for good. After a highly advanced army of Nindroids attacks the Sanctuary, Lloyd flees with his father into the wilderness of Ninjago, while the rest set off on a quest to turn off all power in Ninjago, so that they can erase the Digital Overlord once and for all.

programme.title: LEGO News Holidays Special
programme.desc: In this LEGO News special edition we review and reveal all new LEGO City 2019 sets. We review the LEGO Movie 2 Minifigures 2019 Series 71023 release date February 1st with all your LEGO Movie 2 characters and also LEGO Wizard of Oz minifigures. We also review the new 2019 LEGO Architecture set 21043 San Francisco & 21044 Paris and have a look at first LEGO Forma fish sets released date. We also reveal three new LEGO Brickheadz for 2019 with the Birthday Clown 40348, Dragon Dance Guy 40354 for the Chinese New year, and a Valentine's Puppy 40349.

programme.title: Black Out
programme.desc: The power is out in all of Ninjag, but the hard drive containing the Digital Overlord has disappeared. Some mysterious Stranger has stolen it and is now sending alternatively powered Nindroids to attack the Ninja and capture Lloyd. After destroying the Power Station, the Ninja have dealt a massive blow to the Nindroids, but find getting back to the city troublesome without power. At the Junk Yard, Zane gives half of his heart to revive Pixal to help give guidance in their greater mission. Meanwhile, a mysterious cloaked Interloper steals the hard drive containing the Digital Overlord and creates a new foe for the Ninja to fight… Tech Wu. On the other side of Ninjago, Lloyd is trained by his father to harness his Golden Power to unlock an even greater potential – the power of the First Spinjtzu Master.

programme.title: LEGO Boost Tips, Tricks & More
programme.desc: LEGO Boost is a great LEGO set to learn coding and have fun. Learn to build a simple LEGO build and program it to move back and forth as well. We also make a LEGO Boost Art challenge for the best drawing with Vernie the Robot & the MTR4. Watch the whole video for more exciting fun.

programme.title: The Curse Of The Golden Master
programme.desc: The Stranger and the hard drive with the Digital Overlord are still missing. The ninjas' search for them brings them deep underground where they are assisted by an old enemy. But the Stranger and his Nindroids are getting ever closer to capturing Lloyd. The Ninja return to a powerless New Ninjago City and visit the Serpentine Tombs in effort to solve who had taken the hard drive containing the Digital Overlord – only to discover the snakes have gone straight. They learn of Serpentine Lore that a Golden Master will conquer all of Ninjago. The Nindroids attack, but with the help from Scales and his Serpentine ilk, they fight off the enemy and discover the culprit they are after is none other than Pythor! But it's too late… the Digital Overlord and his henchman have captured Lloyd in a plot to sap his Golden Power to finally become flesh.

programme.title: LEGO Boost Activities and Programming
programme.desc: Callum Daniel from iCodeRobots come up with three fun and easy activities and games. They can be programmed with LEGO Boost set: the Stack Hack, Guitar Challenge and the Arcade Game.

programme.title: Enter The Digiverse
programme.desc: Pythor the Anachondrai and his Nindroids have captured Lloyd and are draining his golden powers to bring the Overlord back into Ninjago. And the Ninja must use the Techno Blades in a daring rescue … inside the Overlord's corrupted hard drive. Unable to save Lloyd in time, the Ninja resort to drastic measures. With the help from Borg's advanced technology, the Ninja get digitized with their Techno Blades into the Digiverse in order to battle the Digital Overlord on his own turf and erase evil for good. While the Ninja learn new capabilities and explore the fantasy of a ‘digital world', their friends must protect them from Pythor and his army in the ‘real world'. In the climatic conclusion, the Ninja ‘reboot the system' and save Sensei Wu and Lloyd, but the Digital Overlord has managed to become flesh in the nick of time, only to be in a weakened state.

programme.title: Game Night Part 2
programme.desc: Awesome LEGO hamster stuff out there and got inspired to make our own LEGO hamster home for a REAL hamster, named Blanche. We've competed to see who is the fastest builder but now we're looking to crown the fastest BREAKER! Grab your brick separators and let's GO!

programme.title: The Grand Hotel
programme.desc: The five friends help out at The Grand Hotel that Andrea's family just bought during what was supposed to be a quiet weekend until a hotel critic arrives unexpectedly. The girls are ready to do everything to make a great impression – but things don't quite go according to plan. Andrea, Stephanie, Olivia, Emma and Mia have come for breakfast at the fanciest hotel in town, now owned by Andrea's family. When Andrea's aunt has to leave town, the girls volunteer to run the hotel for the weekend with the help of quirky Grandma Jean. This is the perfect job for Stephanie's expert managerial skills but then the hotel suddenly fills to capacity with guests, including a hotel critic that can make or break the hotel's reputation! Now the girls find themselves in over their heads juggling reception, childcare, food prep and waitressing, a dog-walking service and a testy chef who quits on them in the middle of dinner. Unfortunately, much of this is their own fault. Can the girls save the Grand Hotel from themselves?

programme.title: Football Training & More
programme.desc: Today on RBKLS we teamed up with one of our favorite creator pairs, JStu, to escape San Fran. Is the RBKLS Squad football material? Check out who makes the cut when Dimitry and Nick take on Christiana and her secret weapon, pro football player Juju Smith-Schuster

programme.title: Getting Out the Vote
programme.desc: It's Stephanie vs. Tanya for Heartlake High Class President. But when Tanya resorts to dirty tricks, Stephanie decides to give her a taste of her own medicine. Elect Tanya as Heartlake High Class President?! "NOOOOOOOO!!!!" Not if Friends Stephanie, Emma, Olivia, Mia and Andrea can help it. The Friends are there to help their pal Matthew defeat Tanya -- even when Emma gets carried off by "Vote For Matthew" balloons! But Tanya figures since "Daddy" is now the Mayor of Heartlake City, she doesn't have to play by the rules. When she sneakily sabotages Matthew's campaign, it's time for a determined Stephanie to take his place as candidate. With the help of her friends, Stephanie is set on running a clean campaign -- that is, until Tanya resorts to more dirty tricks, and Stephanie decides to give Tanya a taste of her own medicine.

programme.title: Earthquake/Bridge Building Challenges
programme.desc: What happens when How Ridiculous meets REBRICKULOUS?! We flew all the way to San Fran, an earthquake hot spot, to learn more about earthquakes. We met up with a structural engineer to test if our own LEGO Buildings could survive an earthquake. We travelled all the way to the Golden Gate Bridge to get inspiration for our next LEGO bridge building challenge.

programme.title: Getting Tthe Message
programme.desc: As the Friends enjoy Heartlake Amusement Park, Emma types a text to Mia, but sends it to Matthew by mistake a text that could be mega-embarrassing for Emma! As her BFF's, the Friends race to find Matthew's phone and erase the text before he reads it. But first, they must brave space rides, dunking booths and worse: the boys locker room! What's more frightening than a roller coaster? Moretwisted than a funhouse mirror? A text gone wrong! TheFriends' fun day at Heartlake Amusement Park turns into afrantic race against time when Emma discovers that herinnocent text to Mia was sent to Matthew by mistake -- atext that accidentally sounds like a pledge of Emma'sundying love for Matthew! Mega-embarrassing! As Emma'sBFF's, the Friends must scramble to retrieve Matthew'sphone and erase the text before he reads it. But first,they need to brave space rides, dunking booths, an angrybrute and worse - the boys locker room!

programme.title: Getting the Message
programme.desc: The girls are reunited with their beloved hero Camp leader Joy at camp only to see her get fired by the mayor, who wants to tear the place down and build a mini golf course.

programme.title: Floss Dance
programme.desc: Learn the dance "The Floss" with LEGO Friends and experience the much more fun.

programme.title: Getting Out the Vote
programme.desc: It's Stephanie vs. Tanya for Heartlake High Class President. But when Tanya resorts to dirty tricks, Stephanie decides to give her a taste of her own medicine.

programme.title: Pranks And Challenges
programme.desc: This epic big digger challenge where we get in REAL machinery to excavate this bigger-than-bricks mission! Who is the best machine operator? Here, we are playing a new game for this very special video: Check it out and see who is saying farewell! This time, we went BIG… to the biggest LEGO store in the world and pranked our lovely London customers. Check out for more fun.

programme.title: Incredible Holiday Buildings Ideas
programme.desc: Disney's Mickey Mouse and Minnie Mouse made their first appearance in “Steamboat Willie” on November 18, 1928 and since then winning our hearts ever since. Recreate this iconic animation with this new LEGO Ideas set, launching April 1. In this episode, the iconic buildings of Mexico City are also featured. Know more about the creator Francisco (LEGOFan_506) and his journey to 10,000 supporters in this exclusive Creator Commentary.

programme.title: Exclusive Voltron Build with LEGO Designers
programme.desc: Discover the production process behind creating LEGO Voltron and participate in a Q&A with Niek and Sam, our LEGO Ideas designers. Also, watch the Voltron transformation while learning more about the LEGO Ideas platform. This episode also presents an exclusive interview with LEGO Ideas grand prize winner and fan designer Quinten aka nasa105 who created the Next FIRST LEGO League World Festival Trophy.

programme.title: Drone Race, Corn Maze And Haunted Halloween Escape Room Challenges
programme.desc: Here, we're going head to head in a marble race and building on the run. Check out our contraption adaptions and see who wins the GIANT marble trophy! Can Nick and Dimitry escape The LEGO Movie 2 Experience room? See what happens when Christiana locks them inside...again

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago The Movie
programme.sub-title: Videogame - Part 1 - Ninjago City (Gameplay Walkthrough HD)
programme.desc: Are you excited? Time to dive into the LEGO Ninjago Movie Videogame, yes it's a confusing name.

programme.title: Football Shootout, Scavenger Hunt and Balloon Pop Challenges
programme.desc: You can't play ”football” without a proper team so we met up with a few players from the Fulham Football Club! Check out this video and see who makes a penalty kick. We build our own LEGO slingshots out of Technic parts and we're splitting up to see who has SKILLZ.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Most Unsmurfy Games: To prove the worth of his Big Book of Wilderness Survival, Brainy takes the Smurflings to the swamp. Where, thanks to his expert advice, the tiny group gets totally lost, is then caught in quicklime and trapped by King Bullrush of the Wartmongers. Fortunately, Bullrush is in a playful mood and devises a Smurf hunt. Unfortunately, Brainy believes he is a born leader...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Baby's First Word: The Smurflings free the Smurfs from the clutches of Gargamel just in time to get Baby to its first word ceremony. Baby utters the word « Gargamel ». Papa Smurf says that this word indicates that Baby will one day become the Great Chief, as he is aware of the dangers in life.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Clockwork Smurf: Handy has built a very complex Smurf machine that does everything. It proves dangerous when it nearly destroys the village, but comes in useful when, with the help of the other Smurfs, it saves the young prince Gerard's kingdom from the queen aunt Imperia's dastardly intentions.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Baby's First Christmas: The wonderful joy of Christmas for Baby Smurf and everyone else is almost ruined by the evil Chlorhydris who puts a spell on Mr. Nicholas to stop him from spreading holiday cheer. Fortunately, Papa Smurf and his little blue creatures break the spell and Christmas spreads over the land once more.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Mud-Wrestling Smurfs: The Wartmongers are draining Smurf River to make mud for their wrestling matches. Clumsy, who has been feeling like a loser at sports, becomes a hero when he must wrestle the Mad Maher as a distraction, enabling Papa and Hefty to break into the factory and destroy the mud making machine.

programme.title: S-Shivering S-Smurfs
programme.desc: Winter has come all of a sudden. The Smurfs are almost all victims of smurfmonia. Can Tracker Smurf find the healing smurfroot without falling into the evil Gargamel's traps?

programme.title: Gormandizing Greedy
programme.desc: Greedy overdoes it. He's getting heavier and heavier until his weight puts him in jeopardy. The evil Gargamel is going to catch him... Can Greedy be saved by Papa Smurf?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Breakfast At Greedy's: This time, Gargamel feels sure of himself. Well, almost. He is going to try and finally catch the little Smurfs! Greedy Smurf's lighter-than-air pancakes are almost responsible for the Smurfs floating into Gargamel's grasp...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Pussywillow Pixies: Clumsy Smurf's misadventures take him across a river into Pussywillow Hollow. There he meets the Pixies – charming and shapely beings whose enemies, the Wartmongers, will meet the Smurfs in some unforeseen ways.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurfs' Christmas: The Smurfs come to the rescue of two children and their grandfather when a mysterious stranger appears and causes their sleigh to crash. Knocking on Gargamel's door for help puts them and the Smurfs in danger…

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Littlest Giant: Simon is lost in the forest and in search of his parents. Simon is the son of a couple of giants. The Smurfs try to bring him home, but then Gargamel interrupts the party.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Greedy And The Porridge Pot: The good fairy, Guinilda gives Greedy a magic porridge pot that Brainy causes to overflow into the village and forest. The good-hearted fairy hurries to the rescue and then asks for the pot back to give to an orphanage of hungry children.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Forget-Me-Smurfs: Little Sickly turns into a hero when he forgets his ailments and saves the rest of the Smurfs from the deadly forget-me flowers.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Don Smurfo: Everyone has their own dreams. That of Smurfette is to meet the legendary Don Smurfo, the dashing, witty, swashbuckling hero of many an engrossing tale. The Smurfs shrug at this infatuation. But when a real-life Don Smurfo appears in the village and Smurfette snubs them all in favor of the bragging stranger, they take the matter a little more seriously.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Most Unsmurfy Games: To prove the worth of his Big Book of Wilderness Survival, Brainy takes the Smurflings to the swamp. Where, thanks to his expert advice, the tiny group gets totally lost, is then caught in quicklime and trapped by King Bullrush of the Wartmongers. Fortunately, Bullrush is in a playful mood and devises a Smurf hunt. Unfortunately, Brainy believes he is a born leader...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Tallest Smurf: Smurfs are three apples high. Smurflings are twenty-five smurfberries high. Except for Slouchy, who only measures twenty-two smurfberries. Apart from Baby Smurf, Slouchy is the shortest Smurf, and the jibes and taunts of the other Smurflings make him wish he were the tallest of the Smurfs... Now it so happens that Gourdy the Genie loves to grant wishes...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Bringing Up Bigfeet: Remember Bigmouth, the ogre, and his lovely wife Bignose? They have a baby now: tiny (by ogre standards) Bigfeet. As the Smurflings Snappy, Slouchy and Nat, and of course the ever-willing Sassette are not entitled to baby-sit Baby Smurf, they volunteer to watch over Bigfeet, while its parents are at the Ogre Ball. The little Smurfs will get more than what they expected...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Petrified Smurfs: Brainy Smurf's done it again. This time, in front of Papa Smurf, too. He has recited a spell that changes everything to stone. Everything including himself and all the Smurfs and the Village, and the forest around for miles... Fortunately, Peewit appears....

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Tattle-Tail Smurfs: Brainy Smurf's had enough. The Smurflings and Sassette keep on telling tales about him with unpleasant results. He therefore concocts a magic formula, taken from Papa Smurf's books of spells, which makes the little Smurfs' tails grow longer and longer every time they tell tales. What he hasn't counted on is that Gargamel now has a way of catching the Smurflings.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Golden Smurf Award: Hogatha disguises herself as the Golden Smurf Award to catch the Smurfs in order to use them as the main ingredient in her beauty cream. Vanity convinces her to try his recipe and before long, the wicked sorceress is covered with mud and sent careening over the hills into Gargamel's house.

programme.title: Rain
programme.desc: A cloud appears in Teletubbyland. The Teletubbies watch some children playing in the rain. Dipsy steps in a puddle. Three magic ships sail through Teletubbyland.

programme.title: Rock Pool Animals 3
programme.desc: Dipsy goes for a walk and sees lots of things in Teletubbyland. The Teletubbies watch as Andy Brown shows some children a rockpool. There's time for one more dance before Tubby Bye Bye.

programme.title: Rolling
programme.desc: Noo-Noo tidies up Laa-Laa's ball. The Teletubbies watch some children rolling things up…and down a hill. Po starts all the other Teletubbies rolling through Teletubbyland.

programme.title: Sand Pendulum
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch three boys fill a sand pendulum and make a picture. Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Laa-Laa follow Po everywhere. The animals march through Teletubbyland, before it is time for Tubby Bye-Bye.

programme.title: Sand Worms (Digging in...)

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: Meet the animals that live in the extremes who have created unique tools and techniques to cope with the harshest challenges to their continued survival. From finding scarce water beneath desert ground to crossing thousands of miles in the skies, these amazing animals have evolved - and learnt - to succeed where other species have failed. In the arid plains of Sri Lanka, a herd of elephants use their impressive memories to track down what little water is left. In the rainforests of Madagascar, a tiny Giraffe Necked Weevil creates an impressive piece of engineering to give her young the best start in life. On a coastal cliff in Portugal White Storks work together to build the largest nests of any bird and fend of any predators that choose to attack them. And in lagoons on the edge of the Black Sea, a Dice Snake use a range of adaptations to demonstrate why he is one of the most successful snake species in the world. All these animals may live in extreme environments but over time they have developed the tools and techniques to thrive. When the environment seems to be against them each animal fights to live another day, proving that its the smartest creatures that have what it takes in the fight for survival.

programme.title: Critical Kingdoms: Stories Of Hope: Africa
programme.desc: Earth's last great wilderness is under threat like never before. From illegal mining and logging causing desertification, a rampant trade in animal parts and the incursion of human settlements into the wild, Africa stands on the brink of an ecological catastrophe. However unbelievable efforts are underway to reverse our human impact. We will begin our journey by looking at the growing illegal wildlife market and the modern technologies that are being used to tackle poachers in Kenya, where also local tribes are reversing centuries old traditions to preserve the Lions. Follows the dramatic sprint of the Cheetah against its own extinction in Namibia and the rescue of the illegally traded cubs in the Horn of Africa. Finally, we venture into the heart of Africa where efforts are being made to save the vast populations of wildlife and show the successful growth of the Mountain Gorilla population.

programme.title: Epic Safari Encounters
programme.desc: Craig joins Kristina at Sango Lodge in the heart of the Save Valley Conservancy where they explore the vast, rugged wilderness. Kristina joins Byrce Clemence and his anti-poaching team as they demonstrate the effectiveness of the anti-poaching dog unit. Tracking notorious rhino on foot keeps their senses alert. Find out what causes the crew to hit the floor.

programme.title: Epic Safari Encounters
programme.desc: Back on the banks of Lake Kariba, Kristina is hosted by the luxurious Bumi Hills Safari Lodge. She tracks lions with her guide Madison, witness elephants swimming and challenges Madison to a fishing bet and finally gets to tick an elusive cat off her bucket list.

programme.title: Epic Safari Encounters
programme.desc: Kristina travels back to Mana Pools to experience the untamed wilderness in the extreme dry season. Her guide, Cloud, takes her on an expedition to find lion cubs and wild dog puppies. Will they find what they are looking for?

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: Enter the world of nocturnal animals... Living your life at night can present extreme challenges - and massive opportunities. In this world without light, danger lurks around every corner. This episode takes us into a world we can barely see - but for many animals it is all they know. Primates like owls, hyenas with super senses and insects that glow have evolved to succeed in this world without light. Whether it's finding food, searching for a mate, or battling off predators, in this murky world only the strongest - and smartest - will survive. In the jungles of Madagascar a secretive relative of the hedgehog communicates through noises produced by it's spines. On the dusty plains of southern Africa a fierce trio of honey badgers fends off a ravenous hyena. Deep in a cave in an isolated part of New Zealand an underground lightshow is produced by millions of tiny insects. And on the coast of Chile, a bat emerges from it's roost. It's time to eateat - and it only feeds on blood... These are just some of the species featured in the third episode. As darkness descends these nocturnal animals have found their own place in a world without light. They've adapted to life in the dark, from finding a mate, to overcoming life's biggest challenges, these creatures have developed some extraordinary skills. They've found their own way to survive - and thrive - when the sun goes down Even when facing seemingly impossible odds animals can still win their fight for survival.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: Meet the creatures uniquely adapted to life in the deep freeze. Animals have evolved to live on every corner of the planet - but none are as resilient as those who live in the coldest climes. We'll reveal the surprising adaptations earth's cold weather creatures have evolved to survive. This episode takes us to lands of freezing temperatures, scarce food and shortened daylight hours. Flourishing amidst ice and snow is one of nature's extreme challenges. At the southern tip of Chile we follow a lost Puma as she searches for her mother in a blizzard. In Finland a brown bear desperately searches for his last meal before entering hibernation for the approaching long, cold winter. In the vast national park of Yellowstone, a pack of wolves hound a herd of elk through the deep snow. And in the Carpathian Mountains of Romania, a Lynx uses his incredible eyesight to track down and kill even the smallest prey. For all animals winter brings unique challenges. But nature's toughest creatures have found incredible ways to survive in our planets coldest regions. Whether it's finding food, impressing a mate, or avoiding the worst of the weather these animals have evolved remarkable adaptations to outsmart the cold and succeed in the relentless struggle to survive.

programme.title: Italy My Love
programme.desc: In ten coastal areas of Italy, we encounter people that have a very special relationship with their region. All of them love their country, their traditions and their work. We met with enthusiasts and hedonists that permitted us to take a glimpse into their everyday lives. Young Italians, who have rediscovered nature and its treasures. Others, that preserve the beauty, archaeologists that apply whole new methods, farmers that only cultivate that which the soil needs. Fishermen, who fish in the same way as it was done a century ago and tough, young men who play and dance the Tarantella. Dolphins, giant sea turtles and pink flamingos, which are researched, nursed back to health or simply observed. Cave explorers, sail makers and coffee specialists are also part of the big picture. Flying drone cameras provide birds-eye views and are an important element of the films. The results are spectacular images from completely different angles which provide us with landscape overviews and detailed insights, the likes of which have never been seen before.

programme.title: Magical Moors
programme.desc: Wide open heaths, windswept and barren in winter, are transformed into wonderful carpets of white, fluffy cotton grass in summer. Large bears and wolves roam alongside delicately fluttering butterflies, the bubbling calls of black grouse and the enchanting trills of the great snipe. Moors, bogs and wetlands can be found all over in Europe. Everyone has at least heard about this habitat but most know little about it. It is an ancient yet largely unknown set of landscapes that is full of enchanting surprises. On a warm spring day, poisonous adders emerge from hiding to perform their impressive mating dance. As dusk falls, snipe gather on traditional leks, leaping and singing to impress the opposite sex. And deep down in the boggy marshes, glittering emeralds of sticky dew lure insects into the deadly arms of meat-eating plants. Magical Moors captures the quiet beauty of a spectacular landscape, and its often elusive wildlife, in stunning detail.

programme.title: Dreams of the Settlers
programme.sub-title: An American Journey: Along the Shores of the Great Lakes
programme.desc: The Great Lakes are among the most mythical landscapes of North America: endless water, endless forest. Many Native American peoples lived there later European settlers followed on the heels of the white hunters and trappers. They hunted in the forests and transported their furs and other goods across the water to the south where a small river situated at the southern tip of Lake Michigan flows onward towards the southern states. The settlement that sprung up there was called Checagou by the Indians. Much later, the settlement was to be the first skyscraper city in the world: Chicago, the megacity on the Great Lake.

programme.title: Dreams of the Settlers
programme.sub-title: An American Journey: Through Louisiana Along the Mississippi
programme.desc: The vast Delta of the Mississippi River is the gateway to the South of the United States. It always has been. This is where our journey begins: through Louisiana along the banks of the mighty river, to the big inland city of New Orleans, founded long ago by the French. Further inland, sugarcane plantations and the villas of their former owners stretch as far as the eye can see. To the north, we leave the river and, taking spectacular roads, we pass through the swamplands of the Mississippi, which were once impenetrable, serving as the ideal hideout for many a runaway. Bordering Texas, where the swamplands end, is the beginning of the vast cattle country. This is home to the last remaining cowboys in the United States who, still today, maintain their French cultural heritage.

programme.title: Dreams of the Settlers
programme.sub-title: An American Journey: Through Utah's Canyons to Salt Lake City
programme.desc: It's a dream route leading from the casino metropolis of Las Vegas, to Salt Lake City, the Mormon capital. It is a journey that follows the footsteps of the first settlers: the Mormons. They came to this desert belt of the United States during the second half of the 19th century to escape persecution and in search of the promised land. Some of them founded Las Vegas. Others moved through the canyons and over the mountains of the colossal Colorado Plateau, where they found water and pasture, to establish many small settlements. The landscapes through which they trekked, had and still have, a breathtaking and bizarre majestic beauty. Bryce Canyon, the hogbacks and the Escalante Staircase plateau are dramatic scenes of wonder formed from rock. The Pajute Indians once described Bryce Canyon as: “red rocks standing like men in a basin”.

programme.title: 15th Meridian East
programme.sub-title: Similarity in Difference: From Generation to Generation
programme.desc: The journey leads from the Norwegian Vesterålen to Chad, the Aeolian Islands and the Polish Giant Mountains. As different as the landscapes and cultures may be, all people are united in their love for their children and their desire to give something to tomorrow's generation.

programme.title: 15th Meridian East
programme.desc: What ideas are people on the 15th meridian east developing to shape the future and leave tomorrow's generations a home worth living in? This consequence leads us to four future designers. From the barren Namib Desert to the glacier worlds of Spitsbergen, Sicily and the Croatian Mediterranean.

programme.title: Black September: Munich Olympics 1972
programme.desc: At dawn, on the 11th day of the XX Olympic Games in Munich, in 1972, 8 Palestinians of the terrorist group Black September climb over the fence surrounding the Olympic village. They head towards the Israeli team's quarter. What happens thereafter is history: eleven Israeli athletes, one German policeman and five terrorists die in a bloodbath. The Munich massacre not only shocks the whole world but also launches a new era of international terrorism. This intense and gripping film provides entirely new perspectives and insights into this traumatizing event with never-before-seen footage of the victims and of the negotiations with the terrorists.
